name: Matthew Macfadyen
summary: Matthew Macfadyen. Actor: Succession. David Matthew Macfadyen was born in Great Yarmouth, Norfolk, to Meinir (Owen), a drama teacher and actress, and Martin Macfadyen, an oil executive. He is of Scottish and Welsh descent. Because of his father's career, he spent at least part of his childhood in Indonesia, before finishing his education back in England and winning a place at RADA in 1992. He won critical acclaim in the...
awards: Won 1 Primetime Emmy | 15 wins & 20 nominations total
